issues.description: Page has no schema markup (structured data)

recommendations.recommendation: Improve Schema Markup for Product Pages
recommendations.reasoning: Enhance product pages with detailed schema markup (Product schema, Review schema) to improve visibility in search results and rich snippets.  This is crucial for e-commerce sites selling specialized clothing like eczema-friendly garments.  Clearly defining product attributes and customer reviews will significantly boost click-through rates.

recommendations.recommendation: Optimize Image Alt Text for Eczema-Specific Keywords
recommendations.reasoning: Images of clothing items should have highly descriptive alt text incorporating relevant keywords like "eczema-friendly baby clothes," "soft cotton clothing for sensitive skin," etc.  This improves accessibility and helps search engines understand the context of your product images, particularly important for a niche market like eczema clothing.

recommendations.recommendation: Create Comprehensive Blog Content on Eczema Care
recommendations.reasoning: Develop blog posts addressing parental concerns related to eczema.  Topics could include "Choosing the Right Fabrics for Eczema-Prone Skin," "Managing Eczema Flare-Ups in Children," or "The Best Laundry Practices for Eczema Clothing." This establishes Happy Skin as a thought leader and attracts organic traffic from parents actively searching for information.

recommendations.recommendation: Conduct Keyword Research Focused on UK-Specific Terms
recommendations.reasoning: Target UK-specific keywords and long-tail keywords related to eczema clothing in the UK market.  This ensures your content reaches the intended audience.  Tools like Ahrefs or SEMrush can help identify relevant keywords with high search volume and low competition.

Clearly define and communicate Happy Skin's unique selling proposition.  What makes your eczema clothing superior to competitors?  Is it the fabric composition, manufacturing process, design features, or a combination?  Highlight this USP across the website to differentiate your brand.

Add FAQPage schema markup to address common customer questions about eczema clothing. This improves search result visibility and provides quick answers to user queries directly in the search results, increasing click-through rates.

The sitemap currently has zero entries, despite the sitemap file existing.  This prevents search engines from effectively crawling and indexing all pages.  Adding all relevant pages to the sitemap will improve discoverability.

Inconsistent trailing slashes in URLs (e.g., `/cookie-policy/` vs `/terms-conditions/`) can cause duplicate content issues.  Standardize the use of trailing slashes or remove them entirely for better SEO.

recommendations.recommendation: Implement a Robust Internal Linking Strategy
recommendations.reasoning: With limited information, a comprehensive internal linking strategy is crucial for improving site navigation and distributing link equity across pages.  This will improve user experience and SEO.

recommendations.recommendation: Enhance Information Architecture with Clear Categorization
recommendations.reasoning: Based on the limited data, the information architecture needs further development.  A clear and logical categorization of content will improve user experience and search engine understanding.
Ensure the website is fully responsive and provides a seamless experience across all devices.  Mobile-friendliness is a crucial ranking factor.

recommendations.recommendation: Optimize hero image loading for faster initial page load
recommendations.reasoning: While the average load time is good, further optimization of hero images can improve perceived performance and user experience, especially on slower connections.

recommendations.recommendation: Improve accessibility of navigation menus on mobile
recommendations.reasoning: Ensure that mobile navigation is intuitive and accessible to users with disabilities.  Test with screen readers and various screen sizes.
Experiment with different button copy, placement, and design to optimize conversion rates.

recommendations.recommendation: Ensure consistent branding and visual hierarchy across all pages
recommendations.reasoning: Maintain a consistent design language across the website, including the privacy and cookie policies, to improve user trust and navigation.
The footer might contain too many links.  Consolidate or categorize links for better usability.
